name: Hikari no Hime:A Magic Fiction
description:
A long time ago, people who could use magic formed colonies in various regions and created countries.
The four magical people of fire attribute, water attribute, light attribute, and dark attribute each use their specialties,
succeed in making the country prosper.
The town of flames flourished as a place for coal mining, gold, silver, and copper mining, blacksmiths, and weapon craftsmen.
Due to the development of agriculture and dairy farming, the market in Mizuichi became lively.
The City of Light is known as a sacred land where clergy live, including churches and hospitals.
The village of darkness has become a cesspool of criminals, black marketers, and assassins underground in the country.
The heroine, the princess of the kingdom, secretly sneaks out of the castle and goes to meet him, under the guise of a field trip.
